Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Determination_00>So, Princess Zelda has been in the past
all along. And she's been fighting the
whole time!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0600>All we can do for her now is gather as
much information as we can about the
<clr:0000>fifth sage<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll do what I can to look into any ruins
from the age of legends!
Talk10:
So it was real after all...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Good thing I found that riddle, huh?<sp:5:0:0>
Way to go, Link!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>We're still searching for Princess Zelda.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0600>But there haven't been any new leads.
If we figure anything out, though, you'll
be the first to know!
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I'll take care of Rito Village, so don't you
worry about it at all. Leave it to me!<sp:0:4:0>And I'll look into the whole Princess Zelda
thing as much as I can while I'm at it!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I think this was meant for a sage, but it
looks too heavy for me. <sp:5:0:0>Maybe it'll fit
once I'm older.<sp:0:4:0>There's definitely some kind of power
stored up in it. <sp:5:1:0>Maybe if you wore it, it'd
make your connection to me stronger.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Yeah! <sp:5:1:0>You should be the one to use
the helm!<sp:0:4:0>That power it has is bound to be useful
in your search for Princess Zelda!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Embarrassed_00>My spirit is always with you, Link.<sp:5:1:0>
If you're ever in trouble, I'll help you
out first thing!
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>Where do you think the <clr:0000>slumbering
treasure <clr:ffff>is? <sp:5:0:0>Could it really be hidden
somewhere in the Hebra Mountains?
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00>Now that we have all the sages, it's finally
time to take on the Demon King!<sp:0:4:0>I'd better brace myself for a doozy of
a final battle.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll be fighting right there with you, Link.<sp:5:0:0>
We'll bring peace not just to Rito Village<sp:5:0:0>
but to all of Hyrule!
Talk10_00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>No way... <sp:5:1:0>You found the <clr:0000>hidden
treasure<clr:ffff> in the center of the three secret
hot springs?!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0600><snd:Determination_00>We need to gather information about the<clr:0000>
fifth sage<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>There's gotta be something we can use
in ruins from the age of legends. I'll keep
looking into it. Don't give up, Link!
Talk10_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>No way... <sp:5:0:0>Are you wearing the
<clr:0000>hidden treasure<clr:ffff> that was supposed to be
at the center of the three hot springs?!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0600><snd:Think>We still haven't found any leads on
Princess Zelda.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>But if we figure anything out, you'll be
the first to know!
Talk10_01:
So it was real after all...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I don't know how you already found the
treasure, <sp:5:0:0>but way to go, Link!
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? <sp:5:1:0>You found <clr:0000>the fifth sage<clr:ffff>?!<sp:0:4:0>So she's an ancient Zonai...<sp:5:1:0>but there's
just the spirit left?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I can't wrap my mind around it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>But it sounds like we can count on her!<sp:5:1:0>
Good job finding her, Link.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0d00>It's finally time to take on the Demon
King! <sp:5:1:0>I need to brace myself for a real
fight, huh?
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Hey! You have a Great Eagle Bow too!
We match!
Talk00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Hi, Link! <sp:5:1:0>Here to see how the village
is doing?
Talk00_01: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Oh, hi, Link. <sp:5:1:0>Good to see you here.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I'll keep getting stronger and stronger
until the day comes when we can fight
together again!<sp:0:4:0>I'm a descendant of the Sage of Wind,
after all. I'm not going to be the one who
holds you back, Link!<sp:0:4:0>I'm worried about Princess Zelda too, so
I'll keep looking into things from this end.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Guess I'm more tired than I thought.
I'm heading back home to rest a bit.<sp:0:4:0>I need to keep the Great Eagle Bow my
dad gave me in tip-top shape too!
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Determination_00>So, Princess Zelda has been in the past
all along. And she's been fighting the
whole time!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0600>All we can do for her now is gather as
much information as we can about this
<clr:0000>fifth sage<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>Mineru<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>I hate to make you do all the work on
this, Link, but at least you've got my
power to lean on whenever you need it!<sp:0:4:0>I'll be right here, patrolling the village
and getting ready for the big fight.
